law.catch_line: Action for trespass or injury to state property.
law.text: The Finance and Administration Cabinet shall institute civil proceedings in the name of the Commonwealth for any trespass or injury to state property under its control.
law.history: Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 56. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3947.
